changeSet.author: Jon.Lent
changeSet.createProcedure:
CREATE PROCEDURE Locking.DeleteLockEntriesOlderThan @MaxAgeInMinutes int = 20 AS BEGIN
DECLARE @CurrentTimeStamp dateTime
SET @CurrentTimeStamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
DELETE FROM OfflineLocks WHERE DATEDIFF(minute, TimePrint, @CurrentTimeStamp) > @MaxAgeInMinutes
END;
changeSet.sql: GRANT EXECUTE ON Locking.DeleteLockEntriesOlderThan TO db_apionly;
changeSet.rollback: REVOKE EXECUTE ON Locking.DeleteLockEntriesOlderThan FROM db_apionly; DROP PROCEDURE Locking.DeleteLockEntriesOlderThan;
